author: balld
msg:
Moved a few things around in ColumnFormatter so that it's possible for columns to be formatted as more than simply a text node (e.g. embedded HTML). Also added a little formatter that can transform \n into
for text and varchar columns.

author: balld
msg: Documented and attributed changes to SQLProcessor

author: balld
msg: Added support for column-specific formatting for dates.

author: stefano
msg: writing a better build script (still in progress)
